metadata.Title: CVE-2017-5930 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium.
metadata.Description:
The AliasHandler component in PostfixAdmin before 3.0.2 allows remote authenticated domain admins to delete protected aliases via the delete parameter to delete.php, involving a missing permission check.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-5930` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

postfixadmin - 3.0.2-2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: postfixadmin package in bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '3.0.2-2').
